name: Whatever Floats your Boat
description:
Play with your mouse

Show your airplane riding friends who's boss, turn your ship into a spaceship with some giant balloons and a small armies worth of ammunition.

all assets made in 48 hours apart from the 1 song:

"Captain Scurvy" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
